other_tests.procedure_name: CT-guided drainage of left pelvic collection
other_tests.findings: Demonstrated a 10.6 x 3.6 cm multi loculated perisigmoid collection containing fluid and gas.

The uterus measures 9.8 x 4.8 x 5.1 cm. Pigtail catheter in the left adnexa partially visualized with multiple foci of air, small amount of fluid, and inflammatory changes seen in the left adnexa extending to the sigmoid colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Collection appears to extend to the margin of the left ovary; small residual fluid and air remains in the pocket with catheter in place.
